item.title: Underwater psychological horror game Dark Mass announced for PS5, Xbox Series, and PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/underwater-psychological-horror-game-dark-mass-announced-for-ps5-xbox-series-and-pc

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Set entirely in a fully submerged underwater manor.

Insomnis developer Path Games has announced Dark Mass, a psychological horror game set entirely in a fully submerged underwater manor. It will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam in fall 2026.

Here is an overview of the game, via Path Games:

About

A haunted past buried beneath the waves

In Dark Mass, players take on the role of Alice, a deep-sea explorer who, alongside her brother Reed, stumbles upon the wreckage of an ancient ship. But beneath it lies something far more sinister—a manor lost to time, eerily untouched despite spending centuries in the abyss.

As Alice ventures inside, she soon realizes she is not alone. Something watches from the darkness. Trapped within the manor’s decaying halls, she must unravel the mysteries of its past, solve dark ritualistic puzzles, and face the horrifying truth that binds her to this place.

With fully voiced dialogue, immersive underwater physics, and a haunting narrative, Dark Mass promises a terrifying descent into the unknown, where every choice matters and survival is anything but guaranteed.

  • ❮
  • ❯

Key Features

  • The First Fully Underwater Horror Experience – Explore a sunken manor, where movement is affected by the deep-sea environment, adding a unique layer of tension and immersion.
  • A Narrative-Driven Psychological Horror – Communicate with your brother Reed through a fully voiced walkie-talkie system as you uncover the chilling truth behind the manor’s curse.
  • Disturbing Ritual Puzzles – Solve unique challenges inspired by historical inquisitorial tortures, unlocking the manor’s darkest secrets.
  • A Relentless Presence Stalks You – Evade Silas, a monstrous entity bound to the manor for centuries, waiting for its next victim.
  • Decisions That Shape Your Fate – Your actions determine how Alice’s story unfolds, leading to different endings.

Playtime

Four to six hours.

item.title: City Tales: Medieval Era launches in Early Access on May 22
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/city-tales-medieval-era-launches-in-early-access-on-may-22

  • PC

Medieval strategic city builder dated.

Medieval strategic city builder City Tales: Medieval Era will launch in Early Access for PC via Steam on May 22, publisher Firesquid and developer Irregular Shapes announced. A demo is available now as part of the “City Builder & Colony Sim Fest” on Steam.

Here is an overview of the game and Early Access release, via Firesquid:

City Tales: Medieval Era will offer an Early Access launch full of content with an intricate economy with over 50 different types of resources and over 60 types of buildings. With its custom 3D procedural engine, which generates each building individually, the player is immersed in a city where each building and each plot is truly unique.

This game lets players step into the role of a medieval lord, directing the shape and growth of their kingdom. Players can try the innovative urban planning tool to draw districts, craft over 60 buildings, and experience the game’s companion system. Builders will grow their settlements from small hamlets to sprawling medieval cities, evolving their creations and eventually building monuments that will truly represent their city.

City Tales: Medieval Era emphasizes the narrative with a cast of companions. These characters work with the player to build the city and whose storyline and growth they get to decide. Player’s decisions shape how each story unfolds, adding a new layer of replayability and immersion to the city-builder genre.

Irregular Shapes plans to expand City Tales: Medieval Era with new content regularly during the Early Access, including more buildings, resources, and a deeper companion system with more narrative elements, maps, and quality-of-life updates. Players who decide to support the Early Access now can also use the Photo Mode to capture their creations and share them with the community on Steam and social media.

item.title: LAN Party Adventures announced for PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/lan-party-adventures-announced-for-pc

LEAP Game Studios has announced LAN Party Adventures, a single-player adventure game that tasks players with setting up lAN parties in various locations and managing the requirements. It will launch for PC via Steam in 2025.

“We’ve been crafting LAN Party Adventures in secret, and we’re excited to finally share it with the world,” said LEAP Game Studios producer Gabriel Shimabuko in a press release. “Our goal is to evoke cherished memories of old-school LAN parties while offering a compelling mystery for players to solve together.”

Here is an overview of the game, via LEAP Game Studios:

About

LAN Party Adventures is a single-player adventure merging storytelling and simulation that takes players back to the early 2000s. In the golden age of massive LAN Parties, strong friendships, and dial-up internet, players will have to set up their own LANs, connect cables and peripherals, and solve the mystery of a friend who’s gone missing.

In LAN Party Adventures, players are tasked with setting up LAN parties in various locations and managing all the requirements. From handling the hardware to plugging the cables, setting up the software, and getting the computers to talk to each other. The game promises a fun blend of straightforward challenges on the simulation side, with a light investigative narrative.

As players work to uncover the truth behind their friend’s disappearance, they’ll need to collaborate with their group, solve puzzles, and follow digital clues. Each new LAN party brings fresh challenges to solve and pieces of the mystery to uncover, as well as a new opportunity to make them larger and funnier by unlocking upgrades and tools.

Players will also be able to set up their own dream LANs in Sandbox Mode, complete with retro-inspired posters, customizable computers, and endless accessories. This creative mode won’t limit creativity and will give players all the tools to set up great setups, from small net-cafes to massive events.

Key Features

  • Adventure Story – A nostalgia-filled single-player adventure with job-sim features.
  • 2000s Tech – Connect VGA cables, manage speeds, avoid viruses, and master the command line.
  • Sandbox Mode – Create LANs in your style.

Watch the announcement trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.

item.title: Painkiller reimagining announced for PS5, Xbox Series, and PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/painkiller-reimagining-announced-for-ps5-xbox-series-and-pc

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Due out this fall.

Publisher 3D Realms and developer Anshar Studios have announced Painkiller, a reimagining of the classic first-person shooter franchise, for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC (Steam). It will launch this fall.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

The classic Painkiller series is back! Battle through Purgatory in fast-paced cooperative action, wielding infernal weapons against relentless demonic hordes. Condemned for your sins, the Voice of the Creator offers you a chance at redemption. Will you seize it or be lost to darkness?

Painkiller is a reimagining of the classic franchise, featuring cooperative play for up to three players and full offline support. Battle hordes of demons and titanic terrors across richly detailed gothic environments.

Trapped in Purgatory, you are sentenced for your transgressions against Heaven. But the Voice of the Creator gives you a chance to redeem yourself. As one of the Champions, you are to stop the fallen angel Azazel who is about to unleash his demonic armies onto Earth. You will face hordes of enemies, demons with unique powers and three monstrous children of Azazel – the Nephilim.

Will you succeed in your mission and earn your salvation?

Key Features

  • Purgatory Is Your Playground – Jump, dash, and hook across vast biomes while fighting enemies with a host of new and classic Painkiller weapons.
  • Grotesque Terrors Await – Challenge a variety of enemies ranging from hordes of smaller demons to titanic terrors.
  • Unleash the Pain – Utilize tarot cards to enhance your abilities and combine them with other players to obliterate your foes.
  • Unique Characters – Choose between four characters: Ink, Void, Sol, and Roch, whose abilities range across energy, health, power, and damage.

item.title: METAL EDEN demo launches April 8
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/metal-eden-demo-launches-april-8

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

New gameplay trailer released.

A demo for science-fiction first-person shooter METAL EDEN will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam on April 8, publisher PLAION and developer Reikon Games announced.

Here are the latest details:

Public Demo Overview

METAL EDEN‘s Mission 0 and 1 will be available for free and for an unlimited period starting April 8 on Steam, PlayStation Store, and Xbox.

Mission 0 introduces players to the core mechanics while teasing the larger mystery behind ASKA’s mission and her unique ability as an android that can be reprinted.
Mission 1, Paradise Lost, builds upon everything players experienced in Mission 0. The mission’s arena encounters start off simple but steadily increase in complexity, challenging players to adapt their strategies. This section also introduces the player upgrade system in two key ways: Body Modules and Weapon Upgrades.

ASKA, a Reprinted Android

The latest METAL EDEN trailer takes players deep into ASKA’s relentless cycle of battle and evolution, following the core gameplay progression that defines her journey.

It opens with a striking scene—ASKA discovering her own lifeless body and extracting her core. This moment introduces the central premise of the game: ASKA dies on her mission, gets reprinted, and tries again, progressing each time and growing stronger.

From there, the action intensifies. ASKA suits up and heads into battle, tearing through enemy lines with her raw power and agility. The trailer reaches its climax with the ultimate show of power—ASKA wielding the game’s most devastating weapon, the Gatling Gun.

This final sequence encapsulates the power fantasy of playing as ASKA at her peak, leaving players eager to step into her role and carve their own path in METAL EDEN. With ASKA’s relentless progression at the heart of METAL EDEN, players will face brutal challenges, evolve their combat abilities, and unleash unstoppable firepower. Stay tuned for more updates as launch approaches.

METAL EDEN presents an adrenaline-fueled science-fiction first-person shooter that explores a world where humanity’s consciousness has transcended the flesh, now residing within robots.

With eight unique missions and a handcrafted universe setting that embraces the cybernetic dimension of life, METAL EDEN plunges players into an artificial world where they’ll dive into cybernetic warfare, control a powerful hyper unit, and uncover the mysteries of a lost paradise.

METAL EDEN is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam on May 6.
